title: If I have hydrogen and oxygen so how can I get water back from both the gases? - Quora

response.answer_text: Three steps involved in this process Split hydrogen gas in to hydrogen atoms Split oxygen gas in to get oxygen atoms Then mix them to get water, this reaction releases lot of heat. This process was only used to lift NASA’s space shuttles (external Tank contains liquid hydrogen and oxygen)
Firstly we have take both gases in 1:2 ratio. We have to pay attention while mixing , hydrogen and oxygen . Simply mix hydrogen and oxygen to get water, this reaction releases lot of heat.
